statements: SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, user_id FROM posts WHERE user_id = '12345';
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id = '67890';
SELECT post_id, created_at FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = '1234' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id IN ('1234', '5678', '91011');
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = 'abcd' AND created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_posts FROM posts;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM likes ORDER BY like_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM likes WHERE post_id = 3 ORDER BY like_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT post_id, user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY post_id, user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM posts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT post_id, user_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY post_id, user_id HAVING like_count > 3;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date ASC;

SELECT post_id, post_content, comment_content FROM posts JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE posts.user_id = 1 AND comments.user_id = 2 ORDER BY posts.post_date DESC, comments.comment_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_id, post_content, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM posts JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id GROUP BY post_id HAVING total_likes > 10 ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, comment_id FROM comments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND comment_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY post_id ASC, comment_date DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT comment_content, comment_date FROM comments WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity_logs WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) as total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(post_id) > 2;
SELECT l.post_id, COUNT(l.user_id) as total_likes, p.post_content FROM likes l INNER JOIN posts p ON l.post_id = p.post_id GROUP BY l.post_id, p.post_content;
SELECT u.user_id, u.activity_type, l.like_date FROM user_activity_logs u LEFT JOIN likes l ON u.user_id = l.user_id WHERE l.like_id IS NULL OR l.like_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT post_id, content, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM likes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id FROM comments WHERE comment LIKE '%great%';
SELECT metric_name, value FROM engagement_metrics WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT post_id, content, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT post_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY post_id HAVING max_value > 100;
